Name: Wreck the Fed
About the game: The GOLD STANDARD of Video Games Fight inflation the right way: by destroying the tools the Federal Reserve uses to manipulate the money supply! Play as libertarian luminaries such as Tom Woods, Michael Malice, Ron Paul, Dave Smith, or Murray Rothbard in your quest to destroy fiat currency and get the high score in this tricky bullet hell shoot-em-up! Arm Yourself with Specie Guns The Golden Gun Golden Deagle Golden Uzi Golden AK-47 Golden Barrett M82 .50 cal Unleash Unique Overpowered Abilities Tom Woods: 3x5 Index Card Michael Malice: Spite Fund Ron Paul: Revolution Dave Smith: Legion of Skanks Murray Rothbard: Human Action Unlock New Looks for All Characters I'd tell you all the unlock codes, but that would take all the fun out of it. But DM me your highscores on Twitter @WreckTheFed and I might spoonfeed you a couple. Acknowledgements Loosely based on a passing reference the Dangerous Documentaries video 'The Politically Incorrect Guide to Real American Heroes'
